gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `FoundationCapitalAndReserves` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `FoundationCapitalAndReserves` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `FoundationCapitalAndReservesMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FoundationCapitalAndReservesMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FoundationCapitalAndReservesMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FoundationCapitalAndReservesMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_FoundationCapitalAndReservesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
